item.title: Business Spotlight: Learn How Dbgear Powerlifted Its Way To Success
item.description: Today you’ll meet a PhD lecturer from the University of Vermont, who is also a snowboarder, weightlifter, punk rocker, skateboarder, and a motorcycle aficionado. Dylan Burns is anything but ordinary.

item.title: Business Spotlight: Bex Skincare Acne Management Llc Provides a Warm and Welcoming Environment to a Wide Range of Clients
item.description: Who is Rebecca Delaney and what is her Business? Rebecca Delaney is a fun, upbeat, and quirky licensed esthetician.

item.title: Business Spotlight: Zimri Cellars Continues to Offer Personal Contactless Wine Deliveries in Oregon
item.description: Meet Jason Bull, winemaker, and owner of Zimri Cellars located in Oregon’s Willamette Valley.
